name: geant4-data

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description: A bundle package to hold Geant4 data packages

dependencies.name: g4ndl
dependencies.description: Geant4 Neutron data files with thermal cross sections

dependencies.name: g4emlow
dependencies.description: Geant4 data files for low energy electromagnetic processes.

dependencies.name: g4radioactivedecay
dependencies.description: Geant4 data files for radio-active decay hadronic processes

dependencies.name: g4particlexs
dependencies.description:
Geant4 data for evaluated particle cross-sections on natural composition
of elements

dependencies.name: g4pii
dependencies.description: Geant4 data for shell ionisation cross-sections

dependencies.name: g4realsurface
dependencies.description: Geant4 data for measured optical surface reflectance

dependencies.name: g4saiddata
dependencies.description: Geant4 data from evaluated cross-sections in SAID data-base

dependencies.name: g4abla
dependencies.description: Geant4 data for nuclear shell effects in INCL/ABLA hadronic mode

dependencies.name: g4incl
dependencies.description:
Geant4 data for evaluated particle cross-sections on natural composition
of elements

dependencies.name: g4neutronxs
dependencies.description:
Geant4 data for evaluated neutron cross-sections on natural composition
of elements

dependent_to.name: geant4
dependent_to.description:
Geant4 is a toolkit for the simulation of the passage of particles
through matter. Its areas of application include high energy, nuclear
and accelerator physics, as well as studies in medical and space
science.
